name: FEC Organic Cotton Tote Bag
description: Sturdy, reusable organic cotton tote featuring the FEC logo. Perfect for farmers markets and everyday use.

name: Alberta Native Plant Seed Kit
description: Collection of 10 native Alberta plant varieties. Support local biodiversity in your garden.

description: Keep drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Eco-friendly alternative to disposable bottles.

description: Compact solar panel with USB output. Perfect for camping and emergency preparedness.

description: Soft, warm hoodie made from recycled materials. Comfortable and sustainable.

name: Urban Gardening Guide Book
description: Comprehensive guide to growing food in small spaces. Written by Alberta gardening experts.
